articles.description: Spotify’s Car View feature has suddenly been discontinued. The feature, which was available through Spotify’s app on both iOS and Android devices, was basically a simplified version of the app, with bigger playback controls and the song title display. Last mo…
articles.content:
Spotifys Car View feature has suddenly been discontinued.
